contents.rollMessage:
${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

Weapon Skill test

Target score: ${target:=WS+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$
Roll : ${roll:=[1d100]}$ -- ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical!' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble!' : 'Failure')}$
Result: SL ${floor(target/10) - floor(roll/10) + SLMod}$ (${target - roll}$)

${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

Ballistic Skill test

Target score: ${target:=BS+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$

rowLayout.rollMessage:
${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

${sameRow('name')}$ test

Target score: ${target:=ref(sameRow('char'))+sameRow('adv')+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$
Roll : ${roll:=[1d100]}$ -- ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical!' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble!' : 'Failure')}$
Result: SL ${floor(target/10) - floor(roll/10) + SLMod}$ (${target - roll}$)

rowLayout.value:
${sameRow('name')==1 ? '
  • Suffer 1d10 + (#-1) Wounds each round, modified with your TB and your weakest armor.

Removed with an Athletics test. Each SL removes an extar Ablazed condition.

' : sameRow('name')==2 ? '
  • Suffer 1 Wound per round, ignoring all modifiers
  • -10 to any test to resist to Festering Wounds, Minor Infection or Blood Rot
  • When reching 0 Wounds, falls unconscious and # * 10% chances of dying per round

Removed with a succesful Heal test. Each SL removes an extra Bleeding condition. Each magically cured Wound removes a Bleeding condition.

' : sameRow('name')==3 ? '
  • -10 to any test involving sight.
  • +1 Advantage to any Attacker.

Removed at the end of the next round.

' : sameRow('name')==4 ? '
  • Your Movement and Action must be used to hide or flee.
  • -10 to any test not used to hide or flee.

Removed on a successful Cool test, if not Engaged. each SL removes an extra Broken condition. Each round hidden removes a Broken condition.

' : sameRow('name')==5 ? '
  • -10 to any test involving Hearing
  • +10 to any opponent attacking from the flank or rear, non cumulative.

Removed at the end of the next round.

' : sameRow('name')==6 ? '
  • Can not move.
  • -10 to every test involving a movement, including Grappling.

Removed with an opposite Strength test against the source of the Entanglement. Each SL removes an extra Entangled condition.

' : sameRow('name')==7 ? '
  • -10 to all tests

Removes after a rest.

' : sameRow('name')==8 ? '
  • Suffer 1 Wound each round, ignoring all modifiers
  • -10 to all tests
  • When at 0 Wounds, can not be healed until every Poisined condition are removed
  • If unconscious, must do an Endurance test after TB rounds. If failed, death.

Removed with a successful Endurance test athe end of each round, or a Heal test. Each SL removes an extra Poisoned condition.

' : sameRow('name')==9 ? '
  • Can only stand up or crawl at Movement / 2
  • If at 0 Wounds, can only crawl
  • -20 to all tests involving movement
  • +20 to any attacker

Removed when the character stands up.

' : sameRow('name')==10 ? '
  • No action, Movement / 2
  • Can not defend using Language Magick
  • -10 * # to any test
  • +1 Advantage to any opponent

Removed on a successful Endurance test (+0). Each SL removes an extra Stunned condition.

' : sameRow('name')==11 ? '
  • Can not do anything
  • +20 WS to any attacker

Removed at the end of the first round, or after the first attempt to attack the character.

' : sameRow('name')==12 ? '
  • Can not do anything

Removal depends on the condition\'s cause. If you use a Resolve point, the character falls back Unconscious at the end of the rounds. Gain Prone on condition\'s removal.

' : ''}$

rowLayout.rollMessage:
${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

Attack with ${sameRow('name')}$

Target score: ${target:=sameRow('skill')+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$
Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$ -- ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical!' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble!' : 'Failure')}$
Result: SL ${slResult:=floor(target/10) - floor(roll/10) + SLMod}$ (${target - roll}$)
Damage: ${ref(sameRow('baseDamage')) + sameRow('damage') + slResult}$
Range / Reach : ${sameRow('range')}$
Qualities / Flaws : ${sameRow('prosCons')}$

${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

Spell : ${sameRow('name')}$

Language Magick test

Target score: ${target:=fetchFromDynamicTable('AdvSkills', 'current', 'name', 'Language Magick')+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$
Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$ -- ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical casting!' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumbled casting!' : 'Failure')}$
Result: SL ${slResult:=floor(target/10) - floor(roll/10) + SLMod}$ (${target - roll}$)

Casting result:

Casting number: ${incantationLevel:=channeled ? (sameRow('learned') ? 0 : 1) : (sameRow('learned') ? sameRow('castingNumber') : (sameRow('castingNumber') == 0 ? 1 : sameRow('castingNumber')*2))}$ (${channeled ? 'Channeled spell' : 'Cast spell'}$ - ${sameRow('learned') ? 'learned' : 'Improvized'}$)
Cast : ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical casting!' : (slResult < incantationLevel ? 'Failed casting' : 'Cast success')) : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumbled casting!' : (slResult < incantationLevel ? 'Failed casting' : 'Cast success'))}$
Duration: ${sameRow('length')}$
Range: ${sameRow('range')}$
Target: ${sameRow('target')}$
${sameRow('desc')}$

${#?{difficultyMod|0}+?{SLMod|0}}$

Prayer : ${sameRow('name')}$

Pray test

Target score: ${target:=fetchFromDynamicTable('AdvSkills', 'current', 'name', 'Pray')+difficultyMod+(advantages*10)}$
Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$ -- ${roll % 10 <= sinLevel ? 'Wrath of the Gods' : (roll > target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Wrath of the Gods' : 'Failure') : 'Success !')}$
Result: SL ${floor(target/10) - floor(roll/10) + SLMod}$ (${target - roll}$)

Prayer result - Wrath added:

Pray test: ${newRoll:=roll % 10 <= sinLevel ? roll + (sinLevel*10) : (roll > target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? roll + (sinLevel*10) : roll) : roll)}$ - ${newRoll > target ? 'Prayer unheard' : 'Prayer granted!'}$
Duration: ${sameRow('length')}$
Range: ${sameRow('range')}$
Target: ${sameRow('target')}$

${sameRow('desc')}$

Cast : ${roll <= target ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical casting!' : (slResult < incantationLevel ? 'Failed casting' : 'Cast success')) : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumbled casting!' : (slResult < incantationLevel ? 'Failed casting' : 'Cast success'))}$
